name: Ignice
description:
Ignitus and Skida have to exit the place by solving enigmas and playing with elements each one can help the other but they leave a deadly trail for the other ! 

WINNER of the Bellecour's 2022 Global Game Jam

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2022 with a team composed of 8 people (JOURDAN Lucas, MOLLIER Mathis, CASCALES Julien, WAWRYSKO Thomas, BALMES Simon, ROUSSEAU Alexandre, VOISIN Julia,  SODANO Matéo)
